name: Diamond collector 2
description:
Oh wow, I made a sequel to a joke game in only 20 minutes, awesome, this game is a joke aswell, uh, go check out the first one I guess.

Credits: Jex_1224: Made the whole game

rechargedphone (doesn't have a itch.io account) Thought of the title for the orignal game.

Clickteam fusion 2.5 free edition: What I used to make the game.

Chexmate 4: I used their turtorial.

Version 1.1: Added sound effects for collecting coins
